Special Powers
CAUSTIC RAGE: Adjacent opposing characters can't use STOP and can't be healed.
BLOOD SORCERY: Probability Control, Close Combat Expert.
UNRELENTING VENGEANCE: FREE: Place Atrocitus adjacent to an opposing character that, since your last turn, damaged Atrocitus or KO'd a friendly character.
